version_description:
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Updated UI
- Updated photo/video viewer
- Updated photo/video import
- Added lock with Touch ID
- Fixed loading iCloud and Dropbox contents

We added in iFile 2.2:
► Support iOS 10
► Indexing of files in Spotlight
► Downloading media files via in-app Browser
► 3D Touch

Also has been optimized summary application performance.

We have carefully read the reviews of our users, so write in a review, what else would you like to see in the iFile!

- Added iPhone X support
- Improved Dropbox integration
- Improved UI

- Added iPhone X support
- Improved Dropbox integration
- Improved UI
